sentences.en: A fleet of ambulances took the injured to hospital.
sentences.cn: 一队救护车把伤者送往医院。

sentences.en: A fleet of French ships was sighted in the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 在北海突然发现了一支法国船队。

sentences.en: A fleet of police cars suddenly arrived. Dozens of officers piled out.
sentences.cn: 突然开来一队警车，数十个警察一拥而出。

sentences.en: Atalanta was fleet of foot (= able to run quickly ) .

sentences.cn: 海军五星上将威廉∙亨特

sentences.en: He made his money with a fleet of moving vans.
sentences.cn: 他靠一队家具搬运车赚钱.

sentences.en: He ordered the combined fleet to convoy troops to Naples.
sentences.cn: 他命令联合舰队将军队护送到那不勒斯。

sentences.en: He was placed in command of the fleet.
He was the highest-paid sub-editor in Fleet Street.
sentences.cn: 他是英国报界薪水最高的副编辑。

sentences.en: In contrast with its surface fleet, Britain's submarine force was relatively small.
sentences.cn: 同其水面舰队相比，英国的潜艇部队规模相对较小。

sentences.en: The authorities fitted the explorers a fleet.
sentences.cn: 当局为探险者配备了一艘舰艇.

sentences.en: the company's new fleet of vans
The fishing fleet comprises around 70 boats.
sentences.cn: 捕鱼船队由大约70艘渔船组成.

sentences.en: The shipowner has still held a merchant fleet of seven cargo - vessels.
sentences.cn: 这个船东仍拥有一支7艘货船的商船队.

sentences.en: Using an alias, he had rented a house in Fleet, Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 他用化名在汉普郡的舰队街租了间房子。

sentences.en: With its own fleet of trucks, the company delivers most orders overnight.
sentences.cn: 这个公司拥有自己的货车车队，大多数订购货品可以隔日送到。

phrases.tran_cn: 佛里特街（英国几家报馆办事处所在地）；伦敦报业；伦敦新闻界

trans.tran_en: a group of ships, or all the ships in a navy

trans.tran_cn: 消磨， 疾驰； 飞逝， 掠过
